content.raw:
use `version 120`? otherwise it'll just output some warnings in ogre.log on deprecated version 120 api calls. 

It should be safe to change as I don't think there are 130 specific API calls. I tested it on my desktop and it's working fine. 

the X11 server we're using on OSX also supports up to version 120 so it would be nice to stay in version 120 for now
